WidgetInfo.Description: This widget displays information about the application including the license and copyright information retrieved from a URL set as a parameter
WidgetInfo.Label: About
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to show information about this application

Parameter.Name: AboutURL
Parameter.Description: This is a pointer to the URL that will be displayed in the popup window
Parameter.Label: URL pointing to the About page

WidgetInfo.Description: AcitivityIndicator is a widget that shows or hides its DOM element based on whether the map widget is busy or not. The map widget becomes busy when loading maps, reloading maps or redrawing layers.
WidgetInfo.Label: Activity Indicator
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: The application is busy

Parameter.Name: ElementId
Parameter.Description: ID of the element in the DOM which contains the indicator
Parameter.Label: Element ID

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to allow selection of the basemaps display under the overlay MapGuide layer
WidgetInfo.Label: External Providers
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to change the basemap

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget will perform a buffering operation on selected features in the Map. Either a popup window or the task pane will be used to gather user input, depending on the setting of the Target parameter
WidgetInfo.Label: Create a buffer
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to create a buffer

Parameter.Name: LayerName
Parameter.Label: Layer name
Parameter.Description: The name of the buffer layer

Parameter.Name: LayerNameInput
Parameter.Label: Layer name input field label
Parameter.Description: The label for the buffer layer name input field

Parameter.Name: BufferDistance
Parameter.Label: Buffer distance
Parameter.Description: The distance to buffer

Parameter.Name: BufferDistanceInput
Parameter.Label: Buffer distance input field label
Parameter.Description: The label for the buffer distance input field

Parameter.Name: BufferUnits
Parameter.Label: Buffer units
Parameter.Description: The units for the buffer distance

Parameter.Name: BufferUnitsInput
Parameter.Label: Buffer units input field label
Parameter.Description: The label for the buffer units input field

Parameter.Name: BorderColor
Parameter.Label: Border color
Parameter.Description: The color of the buffer border

Parameter.Name: BorderColorInput
Parameter.Label: Border color input field label
Parameter.Description: The label for the border color input field

Parameter.Name: FillColor
Parameter.Label: Fill color
Parameter.Description: The color of the buffer fill

Parameter.Name: FillColorInput
Parameter.Label: Fill color input field label
Parameter.Description: The label for the fill color input field

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget will perform a buffering operation on selected features in the Map. Either a popup window or the task pane will be used to gather user input, depending on the setting of the Target parameter
WidgetInfo.Label: Buffer
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to create a buffer

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

WidgetInfo.Description: Center the current selection, if any, but maintain the current scale if possible. Zoom out if not
WidgetInfo.Label: Center selection
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to center the map on the current selection

WidgetInfo.Description: Clears the current selection
WidgetInfo.Label: Clear Selection
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to clear the current selection

WidgetInfo.Description: The user can pick from a palette of web-safe colors or enter a hex value
WidgetInfo.Label: Color picker
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Use this tool to select a color

Parameter.Name: ColorInputId
Parameter.Description: The HTML Input element where the selected color should be written
Parameter.Label: ColorInputId

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget displays mouse coordinates in various projections
WidgetInfo.Label: Coordinate Tracker
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to view mouse coordinates in various projections

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used
Parameter.Label: Target

Parameter.Name: Projection
Parameter.Description: Indicates a list of projections (as EPSG codes) to display coordinates in
Parameter.Label: Projection

WidgetInfo.Description: Provides dynamic cursor tracking as it moves over the map
WidgetInfo.Label: CursorPosition
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: this will display the cursor position

Parameter.Name: Template
Parameter.Label: Template
Parameter.Description: The template string to use to generate the displayed text

Parameter.Name: Precision
Parameter.Label: Precision
Parameter.Description: The precision to display for the coordinates

Parameter.Name: DisplayProjection
Parameter.Label: DisplayProjection
Parameter.Description: The projection to display mouse coordinates in. This can be an EPSG code (EPSG:XXXX) or a WKT string. This parameter takes precedence over the Units parameter if specified

Parameter.Name: Units
Parameter.Label: Units
Parameter.Description: The coordinate units

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget displays the map scale and provides a way for the user to enter a scale value at which to display the map
WidgetInfo.Label: Editable Scale
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Allows display and entry of map scale

Parameter.Name: Precision
Parameter.Label: Precision
Parameter.Description: The precision at which to display the scale

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to navigate forward or backward in the map view extent history

Parameter.Name: Direction
Parameter.Description: The direction in which to traverse the extent history
Parameter.Label: Direction

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget will display information about selected features in a task panel.
WidgetInfo.Label: Feature Info
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to display selected feature info

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget zooms to your current geographic location
WidgetInfo.Label: My Location
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to zoom to your current geographic location

Parameter.Name: ZoomLevel
Parameter.Description: The zoom to apply in addition to panning to your current geographic location
Parameter.Label: Zoom Level

Parameter.Name: EnableHighAccuracy
Parameter.Description: A Boolean that indicates the application would like to receive the best possible results. If true and if the device is able to provide a more accurate position, it will do so. Note that this can result in slower response times or increased power consumption (with a GPS chip on a mobile device for example). On the other hand, if false (the default value), the device can take the liberty to save resources by responding more quickly and/or using less power
Parameter.Label: Enable High Accuracy

Parameter.Name: Timeout
Parameter.Description: A positive number representing the maximum length of time (in milliseconds) the device is allowed to take in order to return a position.
Parameter.Label: Timeout

Parameter.Name: MaximumAge
Parameter.Description: A positive number indicating the maximum age in milliseconds of a possible cached position that is acceptable to return. If set to 0, it means that the device cannot use a cached position and must attempt to retrieve the real current position. If set to Infinity the device must return a cached position regardless of its age.
Parameter.Label: Maximum Age

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget is used to show Google StreetView on the map
WidgetInfo.Label: Google StreetView
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to show Google StreetView

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display Google StreetView for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

Parameter.Name: SymbolLayerName
Parameter.Label: Symbol Layer Name
Parameter.Description: The name of layer that shows the navigator symbol on map

Parameter.Name: ShowDirection
Parameter.Label: Show Direction
Parameter.Description: Whether to show a line to describe the current direction of the camera

Parameter.Name: DirectionLength
Parameter.Label: Direction Line Length
Parameter.Description: The length of the line to describe the current direction of the camera

Parameter.Name: AdditionalParameter
Parameter.Description: A list of key/value pairs that will be added to the URL
Parameter.Label: Additional parameter

WidgetInfo.Description: Outputs a user help page
WidgetInfo.Label: Help
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to get help

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used
Parameter.Label: Target

Parameter.Name: Url
Parameter.Description: The URL which contaions the help page contents.
Parameter.Label: Help URL

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget that will zoom the map to the full extents
WidgetInfo.Label: Zoom Extents
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to zoom to the full map extents

Parameter.Name: ViewType
Parameter.Description: option to zoom to full map extents or just the initial extent
Parameter.Label: ViewType

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to execute arbitrary javascript

Parameter.Name: Script
Parameter.Description: The JavaScript code to be executed
Parameter.Label: Script

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to call up a URL into the TaskPane, a new window or HTML element. The map name and Session ID are automatically added to the URL, as well as any additional parameters specifed

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used
Parameter.Label: Target

Parameter.Name: Url
Parameter.Description: The URL to be opened in the target
Parameter.Label: URL

Parameter.Name: DisableIfSelectionEmpty
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if this widget should only be enabled if there is a selection available on the map
Parameter.Label: DisableIfSelectionEmpty

Parameter.Name: AdditionalParameter
Parameter.Description: A list of key/value pairs that will be added to the URL
Parameter.Label: Additional parameter

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget that displays a listing of all layers that make up the map as a tree structure

Parameter.Name: ShowRootFolder

Parameter.Name: ShowMapFolder

Parameter.Name: LayerRasterIcon

Parameter.Name: Folder

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to display information about features under the mouse as it hovers over the map

Parameter.Name: Layer
Parameter.Description: The layers to display information about

Parameter.Name: Tolerance
Parameter.Description: The number of screen pixels around the cursor to query
Parameter.Label: Tolerance

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to open hyperlinks. If empty, a new window is used

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget that allows measurements to be made on the map

Parameter.Name: DistancePrecision

Parameter.Label: DistancePrecision

Parameter.Name: AreaPrecision
Parameter.Description: Precision of the area displayed
Parameter.Label: Area Precision

Parameter.Name: Type
Parameter.Description: The type of measurement to display
Parameter.Label: measurement type

Parameter.Name: MeasureTooltipContainer
Parameter.Description: String
Parameter.Label: an HTML container to put the current distance in

Parameter.Name: FillStyle
Parameter.Description: Style for the polygon used for area draw
Parameter.Label: Fill style

Parameter.Name: LineStyleWidth
Parameter.Description: width of the line to use
Parameter.Label: Line style width

Parameter.Name: LineStyleColor
Parameter.Description: color to use for drawing lines

Parameter.Name: MeasureTooltipType
Parameter.Description: Type of tooltip measurement to use
Parameter.Label: Measure tooltip type

Parameter.Name: MeasureTipPositionTop
Parameter.Description: Static position of Tooltip Box TOP
Parameter.Label: Measure Tip Top Position

Parameter.Name: MeasureTipPositionLeft
Parameter.Description: Static position of Tooltip Box LEFT
Parameter.Label: Measure Tip Left Position

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

WidgetInfo.Description: In-map navigator widget
WidgetInfo.Label: Navigator
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to navigate the map

WidgetInfo.Description: A key map to locate the vewing area of the primary map
WidgetInfo.Label: Overview map
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click and drag to recenter the map

Parameter.Name: MapId
Parameter.Description: The ID of a map from the fusion MapSet to use as the map image. If this parameter is missing, the main map will be re-used.
Parameter.Label: MapId

Parameter.Name: MinRatio
Parameter.Description: The ratio of the overview map resolution to the main map resolution at which to zoom farther out on the overview map.
Parameter.Label: Minimum ratio

Parameter.Name: MaxRatio
Parameter.Description: The ratio of the overview map resolution to the main map resolution at which to zoom farther in on the overview map.
Parameter.Label: Maximum ratio

WidgetInfo.Description: Pans the map
WidgetInfo.Label: Pan
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click and drag to pan the map

WidgetInfo.Description: Pans the map in the specified direction on a click

Parameter.Name: Percentage
Parameter.Description: Percentage of the map width/height to move in the specified direction
Parameter.Label: Percentage

Parameter.Name: Direction
Parameter.Description: The direction in which to pan
Parameter.Label: Direction

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget that combines pan and query actions. If the mouse did not move, a query is issued, otherwise a pan is performed
WidgetInfo.Label: Pan query
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Drag the mouse to pan, click to query

Parameter.Name: SelectionType
Parameter.Description: The type of selection to do
Parameter.Label: Selection type

Parameter.Name: Tolerance
Parameter.Description: pixel tolerance for a point click
Parameter.Label: Tolerance

Parameter.Name: QueryActiveLayer
Parameter.Description: Flag to indicate if features should be selected only on the active layer
Parameter.Label: Query active layer

WidgetInfo.Description: Produces a printable version of the page
WidgetInfo.Label: Print
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Print the current map view

Parameter.Name: ShowPrintUI
Parameter.Description: Show the print dialog to allow configuration before printing
Parameter.Label: Show print dialog

Parameter.Name: ShowTitle
Parameter.Description: Show the title on the page
Parameter.Label: Show title

Parameter.Name: PageTitle
Parameter.Description: The title for the page
Parameter.Label: Page title

Parameter.Name: ShowLegend
Parameter.Description: Show the legend on the page
Parameter.Label: Show legend

Parameter.Name: ShowNorthArrow
Parameter.Description: Show the north arrow on the page
Parameter.Label: Show north arrow

Parameter.Name: ImageBaseUrl
Parameter.Description: relative URL to the images directory for dialog
Parameter.Label: Image Base URL

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget will execute a custom query on the map. Either a popup window or the task pane will be used to gather user input, depending on the setting of the Target parameter
WidgetInfo.Label: Query
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to execute a custom query

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget offers a quick way to print map
WidgetInfo.Label: Quick Plot
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to create a plot quickly

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used
Parameter.Label: Target

Parameter.Name: RememberPlotOptions
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to persist the current QuickPlot UI settings to a cookie. If empty or false, these settings will not be saved
Parameter.Label: RememberPlotOptions

Parameter.Name: ShowCoordinateLabels
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to show the coordinate labels in the QuickPlot preview dialog. If empty, will default to true
Parameter.Label: ShowCoordinateLabels

Parameter.Name: ShowSubTitle
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to show the sub title in the QuickPlot UI and preview dialog. If empty, will default to true
Parameter.Label: ShowSubTitle

Parameter.Name: DefaultDpi
Parameter.Description: Indicates the default DPI to use for plotting. If specified, this will hide the DPI field in the QuickPlot UI and will override whatever DPI is used.
Parameter.Label: DefaultDpi

Parameter.Name: PaperListEntry
Parameter.Description: Indicates a list of name/value pairs that will override the paper size list in the QuickPlot UI if specified.
Parameter.Label: PaperListEntry

Parameter.Name: ScaleListEntry
Parameter.Description: Indicates a list of name/value pairs that will override the scale list in the QuickPlot UI if specified.
Parameter.Label: ScaleListEntry

Parameter.Name: DefaultMargin
Parameter.Description: Indicates the default Margin to use for plotting. If specified, this will hide the Margin field in the QuickPlot UI and will override whatever Margin is used.
Parameter.Label: Margin

Parameter.Name: Disclaimer
Parameter.Description: The legal disclaimer text to show in the preview dialog and final printout
Parameter.Label: Disclaimer
Parameter.DefaultValue: The materials available at this web site are for informational purposes only and do not constitute a legal document.

Parameter.Name: AllowDisclaimerToggle
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the disclaimer element in the Quick Plot UI is shown by default (allowing it to be toggled). This is already hidden if there is no configured disclaimer, this option allows you to hide it if there is a configured disclaimer (ie. You always want to have the disclaimer in the final plot). Defaults to true if unspecified
Parameter.Label: AllowDisclaimerToggle

Parameter.Name: ShowLegend
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the legend element in the Quick Plot UI is checked by default. Defaults to false if unspecified
Parameter.Label: ShowLegend

Parameter.Name: ShowNorthArrow
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the north arrow element in the Quick Plot UI is checked by default. Defaults to false if unspecified
Parameter.Label: ShowNorthArrow

Parameter.Name: ShowCoordinates
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the coordinates element in the Quick Plot UI is checked by default. Defaults to false if unspecified
Parameter.Label: ShowCoordinates

Parameter.Name: ShowScaleBar
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the scale bar element in the Quick Plot UI is checked by default. Defaults to false if unspecified
Parameter.Label: ShowScaleBar

Parameter.Name: ShowLegalDisclaimer
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the legal disclaimer element in the Quick Plot UI is checked by default. Has no effect if this widget has no disclaimer configured. Defaults to true if unspecified
Parameter.Label: ShowLegalDisclaimer

WidgetInfo.Description: This widget opens a panel in the TaskPane and allows the user to digitize features that can be downloaded as a GML file or uploaded to restore previously digitized features.
WidgetInfo.Label: Redline
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to draw redline features

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

Parameter.Name: AutogenerateLayerNames
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to prompt the auto-generate redline layer names when creating a new redline layer or to prompt the user. Default is true (don't prompt)
Parameter.Label: AutogenerateLayerNames

Parameter.Name: UseMapMessage
Parameter.Description: Indicates to use the map message bar for digitization prompts. Default is true
Parameter.Label: UseMapMessage

Parameter.Name: DataStoreFormat
Parameter.Description: The default data store format. Valid values include: SDF, SHP or SQLite
Parameter.Label: DataStoreFormat

Parameter.Name: RedlineGeometryFormat
Parameter.Description: The types of redline geometry that the user can record. If the data store is SHP, only one geometry type can be specified. Value is a bitmask of any of the following values: (1=point, 2=line, 4=polygon)
Parameter.Label: RedlineGeometryFormat

Parameter.Name: AutoCreateOnStartup
Parameter.Description: If DataStoreFormat and RedlineGeometryFormat parameters are specified, determines if the redline data store is automatically created on widget invocation. If true, the widget starts off in the Redline editing page instead of the Redline Management page
Parameter.Label: AutoCreateOnStartup

Parameter.Name: StylizationType
Parameter.Description: Determines which type of stylization to use for rendering redline features.
Parameter.Label: StylizationType

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget that redraws the map
WidgetInfo.Label: Refresh
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to redraw the map

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to save the map as an image
WidgetInfo.Label: Save map
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to save the map as an image

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Description: The image format to use
Parameter.Label: Format

Parameter.Name: Scale
Parameter.Description: The scale at which the map is to be saved, or 0 to use the current map scale
Parameter.Label: Scale

Parameter.Name: ResourceId
Parameter.Description: The print layout to be used for DWF creation. This is mandatory if the format is set to DWF.
Parameter.Label: Print Layout (DWF Only)

WidgetInfo.Description: Outputs a cartographic scalebar

Parameter.Name: Style
Parameter.Description: Name of a style for the scalebbar
Parameter.Label: Style

Parameter.Name: DisplaySystem

Parameter.Label: Display units

Parameter.Name: MinWidth
Parameter.Description: Minimum width of the scalebar in pixels
Parameter.Label: Minimum width

Parameter.Name: MaxWidth
Parameter.Description: Maximum width of the scalebar in pixels
Parameter.Label: Maximum width

Parameter.Name: Divisions
Parameter.Description: The number of major divsions to use
Parameter.Label: Divisions

Parameter.Name: SubDivisions
Parameter.Description: The number of minor divisions within each major divsion
Parameter.Label: SubDivisions

Parameter.Name: ShowMinorMeasures
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if the minor divsions should be displayed
Parameter.Label: ShowMinorMeasures

Parameter.Name: AbbreviateLabel
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if the full or an abbreviated units name is displayed
Parameter.Label: Abbreviate label

Parameter.Name: SingleLine
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if the scalebar should bee drawn all on a single line
Parameter.Label: Single line

WidgetInfo.Description: A dynamically generated cartographic scalebar that looks like the Google scalebar
WidgetInfo.Label: ScalebarDual

Parameter.Name: MaxWidth
Parameter.Description: Maximum width of the scalebar in pixels
Parameter.Label: Maximum width

Parameter.Name: TopInUnits
Parameter.Description: Units for zoomed in on top bar
Parameter.Label: Top bar units (zoomed in)

Parameter.Name: TopOutUnits
Parameter.Description: Units for zoomed out on top bar
Parameter.Label: Top bar units (zoomed out)

Parameter.Name: BottomInUnits
Parameter.Description: Units for zoomed in on bottom bar
Parameter.Label: Bottom bar units (zoomed in)

Parameter.Name: BottomOutUnits
Parameter.Description: Units for zoomed out on bottom bar
Parameter.Label: Bottom bar units (zoomed out)

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget which will perform an attribute based search
WidgetInfo.Label: Search
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to carry out a search on the map data

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

Parameter.Name: Prompt
Parameter.Description: The prompt to display beside the user input
Parameter.Label: Prompt

Parameter.Name: Layer
Parameter.Description: Layer name in the map on which to carry out the search
Parameter.Label: Layer

Parameter.Name: Filter
Parameter.Description: The search expression template to return features. The filter must include a $USER_VARIABLE placeholder (that will contain the search term)
Parameter.Label: Filter

Parameter.Name: MatchLimit
Parameter.Description: The maximum number of hits to return
Parameter.Label: Match limit

Parameter.Name: ResultColumns
Parameter.Description: An XML structure describing the columns to be returned as part of the search and their labels
Parameter.Label: ResultColumns

Parameter.Name: Title
Parameter.Description: The title to use for the search form
Parameter.Label: Title

Parameter.Name: PointZoomLevel
Parameter.Label: Point zoom level
Parameter.Description: The zoom level to use when clicking on a point feature search result. Note that when basemaps are active, it will zoom to the discrete zoom level closest to the specified value

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget that allows selection of features on a map

Parameter.Name: QueryActiveLayer

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to perform a selection within a currently selected set of features
WidgetInfo.Label: Select within
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to select features within this selection

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

WidgetInfo.Description: Display the size of the current view in user-definable units
WidgetInfo.Label: ViewSize
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: The size of the map

Parameter.Name: Units
Parameter.Description: the units to display the size in
Parameter.Label: Units

Parameter.Name: Precision
Parameter.Description: Precision of the size displayed
Parameter.Label: DistancePrecision

Parameter.Name: Template
Parameter.Description: A template string to display the size. Values in {} will be replaced by actual values
Parameter.Label: Template

WidgetInfo.Description: Zooms in on the map
WidgetInfo.Label: Zoom Rectangle
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click or click and drag on the map to zoom in
WidgetInfo.StatusText: Click or click and drag on the map to zoom in

Parameter.Name: Tolerance
Parameter.Description: Zoom tolerance
Parameter.Label: Tolerance

Parameter.Name: Factor
Parameter.Description: The amount to zoom in or out
Parameter.Label: Factor

Parameter.Name: Direction
Parameter.Description: Indicates if the map should zoom in or out
Parameter.Label: Direction

WidgetInfo.Description: Zoom the map by a fixed amount when a button is clicked

Parameter.Name: Factor
Parameter.Description: The factor to zoom by. Values less than 0 zoom out.
Parameter.Label: Factor

WidgetInfo.Description: A widget that will zoom the map to the currently selected features
WidgetInfo.Label: Zoom Selection
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to zoom to the selection

Parameter.Name: MaximumZoomDimension
Parameter.Description: Controls how much to zoom
Parameter.Label: MaximumZoomDimension

Parameter.Name: ZoomFactor
Parameter.Description: The amount to zoom allowing all features to still be displayed
Parameter.Label: Zoom factor
